qcfpunch:AsceticMonk.NAME: Ascetic Monk
qcfpunch:AsceticMonk.DESCRIPTION: Start with Broken Tusk, Necklace Of Skulls and Lotus Statue.

qcfpunch:BlazingFist.NAME: 炙热龙拳
qcfpunch:BlazingFist.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有黑色训练衬衫，红色道服和不灭烈火

qcfpunch:BlueJade.NAME: 玉兰花
qcfpunch:BlueJade.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有护手刺，白靴和手铐。

qcfpunch:DeltaSpike.NAME: Delta Spike
qcfpunch:DeltaSpike.DESCRIPTION: Start with Red Beret, Green Leotard and Special Ops Insignia.

qcfpunch:HalfHealthBar.NAME: 半血
qcfpunch:HalfHealthBar.DESCRIPTION: 开局拥有 50% 的生命上限。

qcfpunch:IndestructibleFortress.NAME: 不动要塞
qcfpunch:IndestructibleFortress.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有军靴，铭牌和迷彩服。

qcfpunch:LoweringTheHandicap.NAME: 降低门槛
qcfpunch:LoweringTheHandicap.DESCRIPTION: 开局拥有 125% 的生命上限。

qcfpunch:QuarterHealthBar.NAME: 红血
qcfpunch:QuarterHealthBar.DESCRIPTION: 开局拥有 25% 的生命上限。

qcfpunch:RedCyclone.NAME: Red Cyclone
qcfpunch:RedCyclone.DESCRIPTION: Start with Wrestler's Cloak, Wild Herbs Ointment and Red Cyclone Teachings.

qcfpunch:WanderingWarrior.NAME: 修行格斗家
qcfpunch:WanderingWarrior.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有旅行袋，格斗手套和红色头带。
